name: Alexandra Boldyreva
content: Alexandra (Sasha) Boldyreva I am a Professor with partial appointments in the School of Cybersecurity and Privacy and the School of Computer Science of the College of Computing at Georgia Tech. I am doing research in the areas of cryptography and cybersecurity. I am an Associate Chair for Graduate Studies in the School of Cybersecurity and Privacy. Current Ph.D. students: Deep Inder Mohan Kaishuo Cheng Former Ph.D. students: David Cash - Professor at University of Chicago Adam O'Neill - Assistant Professor at UMass, Amherst Virendra Kumar - Senior Staff Engineer at Qualcomm Nathan Chenette - Associate Professor at Rose Hulman Robert Lychev - Meta Shan Chen - Assistant Professor at the Southern University of Science and Technology Tianxin Tang - Postdoctoral Researcher at Eindhoven University of Technology Former M.S. students: Yi Ding Jiahui Lu Jiahao Sun Former Postdocs: Dae Hyun Yum - Myongji University Younho Lee - Seoul National University of Science and Technology Contact info: Email: sasha *AT* gatech *DOT* edu Office: CODA S0913
